text: Day predpisaniye dobra dlya nas I v etoy zhizni, i v dalekoy, - Ved' my, poistine, Tebe predalis'!" I On skazal: "YA nakazaniyem Svoim Karayu tekh, kogo zhelayu, No Moya milost' prostirayetsya na vsekh. YA predpishu yeye dlya tekh, kotoryye blagochestivy, I ochishcheniye dayut, I veruyut v znamen'ya Nashi
